KADE maxArcade - MAME 4 Player Encoder (Beta)

pin Function Key Mapping
D00 Player 1 - Up Up Arrow
D01 Player 1 - Down Down Arrow
D02 Player 1 - Left Left Arrow
D03 Player 1 - Right Right Arrow
D04 Player 1 - Button 1 Left-Ctrl
D05 Player 1 - Button 2 Left-Alt
D06 Player 1 - Button 3 Space
D07 Player 1 - Button 4 Left-Shift
D08 Player 1 - Button 5 Z
D09 Player 1 - Button 6 X
D10 Player 4 - Up Y
D11 Player 4 - Down N
D12 Player 4 - Left V
D13 Player 4 - Right U
D14 Player 4 - Button 1 Keypad-0
D15 Player 4 - Button 2 Keypad-Minus
D16 Player 4 - Button 3 Keypad-Enter
D17 Player 4 - Button 4 Keypad-Plus
D18 Exit/Escape ESC
D19 Player 2 - Up R
D20 Player 2 - Down F
D21 Player 2 - Left D
D22 Player 2 - Right G
D23 Player 2 - Button 1 A
D24 Player 2 - Button 2 S
D25 Player 2 - Button 3 Q
D26 Player 2 - Button 4 W
D27 Player 2 - Button 5 I
D28 Player 2 - Button 6 K
D29 Player 3 - Up Page Up
D30 Player 3 - Down Page Down
D31 Player 3 - Left Home
D32 Player 3 - Right End
D33 Player 3 - Button 1 Right-Ctrl
D34 Player 3 - Button 2 Right-Shift
D35 Player 3 - Button 3 Enter
D36 Player 3 - Button 4 Backslash
A00 Player 1 - Start 1
A01 Player 2 - Start 2
A02 Player 3 - Start 3
A03 Player 4 - Start 4
A04 Player 1 - Coin 5
A05 Player 2 - Coin 6
A06 Player 3 - Coin 7
A07 Player 4 - Coin 8
